thread.title: Justin Bieber Goes for Naked Swim With Model Jayde Pierce in Bora Bora
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Goes for Naked Swim With Model Jayde Pierce in Bora Bora

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber Goes for Naked Swim With Model Jayde Pierce in Bora Bora
text:
Comments The 'What Do You Mean' crooner was photographed strolling around naked in his villa before going skinny dipping in the pool. 
Justin Bieber went for naked swim during his vacation to Bora Bora with model Jayde Pierce on Tuesday, October 6. In some photos obtained by New York Daily News , the "Baby" hitmaker was seen walking around completely naked in his villa, putting his tan lines on full display. Jayde was photographed on the same deck as Justin's, but instead of stripping down to nothing, she was seen strolling around with a white cloth robe on. The "What Do You Mean" singer was later seen going skinny dipping into his private pool. Justin and Jayde have taken to Instagram to share some photos from their getaway, but they have not shared pictures featuring each other. On Tuesday, Justin shared a photo of his new tattoo on his flat abs inspired by his new album title " Purpose ". He later added a photo of him standing on the edge of a blue pool. Oct 6, 2015 at 5:48pm PDT Jayde, meanwhile, posted some pictures of her showing off her beach body in white swimsuit. A photo posted by Jayde Pierce (@jaydepierce) on Oct 4, 2015 at 3:20pm PDT Oct 5, 2015 at 2:02pm PDT  A photo posted by Jayde Pierce (@jaydepierce) on Oct 5, 2015 at 6:19pm PDT
